timeline.bodyText:
GeoServer core depends on Guava 27:
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
      <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
      <version>27.0-jre</version>
    </dependency>

This might fix the test failures but... would it work at runtime, when the guava 27.0-jre is deployed?
@afabiani ?
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: guess there shouldn't be problem, cause the guava 18.0 was needed for qpid dependecy that in turn has test scope. my apoligizes I shoud have added this in a comment to the pr
replies.author: taba90
